mentions.candidate: Matthew Groves trained as a lawyer and has worked for fair results for consumers. Matthew will be your voice for Plymouth. With legal training he's experienced in standing up for ordinary people and will be there to fight for you.

housing.content: Matthew discusses with Housing Association tenant how the scheme has helped reduce anti-social behaviour and develop the community. Matthew wants to make sure that if people work hard they get what needs to be done sorted. Making sure that young people are getting on the housing ladder will ensure that local families stay together.

images.caption: Matthew Groves speaking with different groups of people in various settings
